verses.verse: וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> And there shall come forth חֹ֖טֶר <WH2415> a rod מִגֵּ֣זַע <WH1503> out of the stem יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> of Jesse וְנֵ֖צֶר <WH5342> and a Branch מִשָּׁרָשָׁ֥יו <WH8328> out of his roots יִפְרֶֽה׃ <WH6509> shall grow

וְנָחָ֥ה <WH5117> shall rest עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the spirit יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD ר֧וּחַ <WH7307> upon him the spirit חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> of wisdom וּבִינָ֗ה <WH998> and understanding ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit עֵצָה֙ <WH6098> of counsel וּגְבוּרָ֔ה <WH1369> and might ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit דַּ֖עַת <WH1847> of knowledge וְיִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> and of the fear יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַהֲרִיח֖וֹ <WH7306> And shall make him of quick understanding בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> in the fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor לְמַרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> after the sight עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> of his eyes יִשְׁפּ֔וֹט <WH8199> and he shall not judge וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor לְמִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH4926> after the hearing אָזְנָ֖יו <WH241> of his ears יוֹכִֽיחַ׃ <WH3198> neither reprove

וְשָׁפַ֤ט <WH8199> shall he judge בְּצֶ֙דֶק֙ <WH6664> But with righteousness דַּלִּ֔ים <WH1800> the poor וְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <WH3198> and reprove בְּמִישׁ֖וֹר <WH4334> with equity לְעַנְוֵי־ <WH6035> for the meek אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְהִֽכָּה־ <WH5221> and he shall smite אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the earth בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> with the rod פִּ֔יו <WH6310> of his mouth וּבְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> and with the breath שְׂפָתָ֖יו <WH8193> of his lips יָמִ֥ית <WH4191> shall he slay רָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> the wicked

וְהָ֥יָה <WH1961> become צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> And righteousness אֵז֣וֹר <WH232> shall be the girdle מָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> of his loins וְהָאֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> and faithfulness אֵז֥וֹר <WH232> the girdle חֲלָצָֽיו׃ <WH2504> of his reins

וְגָ֤ר <WH1481> also shall dwell זְאֵב֙ <WH2061> The wolf עִם־ <WH5973> with כֶּ֔בֶשׂ <WH3532> with the lamb וְנָמֵ֖ר <WH5246> and the leopard עִם־ <WH5973> with גְּדִ֣י <WH1423> with the kid יִרְבָּ֑ץ <WH7257> shall lie down וְעֵ֨גֶל <WH5695> and the calf וּכְפִ֤יר <WH3715> and the young lion וּמְרִיא֙ <WH4806> and the fatling יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together וְנַ֥עַר <WH5288> child קָטֹ֖ן <WH6996> and a little נֹהֵ֥ג <WH5090> shall lead בָּֽם׃

וּפָרָ֤ה <WH6510> And the cow וָדֹב֙ <WH1677> and the bear תִּרְעֶ֔ינָה <WH7462> shall feed יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together יִרְבְּצ֣וּ <WH7257> shall lie down יַלְדֵיהֶ֑ן <WH3206> their young ones וְאַרְיֵ֖ה <WH738> and the lion כַּבָּקָ֥ר <WH1241> like the ox יֹֽאכַל־ <WH398> shall eat תֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> straw

וְשִֽׁעֲשַׁ֥ע <WH8173> shall play יוֹנֵ֖ק <WH3243> And the sucking child עַל־ <WH5921> and חֻ֣ר <WH2356> cave פָּ֑תֶן <WH6620> of the asp וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and מְאוּרַ֣ת <WH3975> den צִפְעוֹנִ֔י <WH6848> on the cockatrice' גָּמ֖וּל <WH1580> and the weaned child יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> his hand הָדָֽה׃ <WH1911> shall put

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> They will not יָרֵ֥עוּ <WH7489> They shall not hurt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or יַשְׁחִ֖יתוּ <WH7843> nor destroy בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> in all my holy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> shall be full הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> for the earth דֵּעָה֙ <WH1844> of the knowledge אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God כַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> as the waters לַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> the sea מְכַסִּֽים׃ <WH3680> cover פ

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he שֹׁ֣רֶשׁ <WH8328> there shall be a root יִשַׁ֗י <WH3448> of Jesse אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Who עֹמֵד֙ <WH5975> which shall stand לְנֵ֣ס <WH5251> for an ensign עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> to it shall the Gentiles יִדְרֹ֑שׁוּ <WH1875> seek וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become מְנֻחָת֖וֹ <WH4496> and his rest כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> shall be glorious פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יוֹסִ֨יף <WH3254> again אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <WH136> [that] the Lord שֵׁנִית֙ <WH8145> the second time יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand לִקְנ֖וֹת <WH7069> to recover אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> the remnant עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> of his people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יִשָּׁאֵר֩ <WH7604> which shall be left מֵאַשּׁ֨וּר <WH804> from Assyria וּמִמִּצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> and from Egypt וּמִפַּתְר֣וֹס <WH6624> and from Pathros וּמִכּ֗וּשׁ <WH3568> and from Cush וּמֵעֵילָ֤ם <WH5867> and from Elam וּמִשִּׁנְעָר֙ <WH8152> and from Shinar וּמֵ֣חֲמָ֔ת <WH2574> and from Hamath וּמֵאִיֵּ֖י <WH339> and from the islands הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> And he shall set up נֵס֙ <WH5251> an ensign לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> for the nations וְאָסַ֖ף <WH622> and shall assemble נִדְחֵ֣י <WH1760> the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּנְפֻצ֤וֹת <WH5310> the dispersed יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah יְקַבֵּ֔ץ <WH6908> and gather together מֵאַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> from the four כַּנְפ֥וֹת <WH3671> corners הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְסָ֙רָה֙ <WH5493> shall depart קִנְאַ֣ת <WH7068> The envy אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> also of Ephraim וְצֹרְרֵ֥י <WH6862> adversary יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ <WH3772> shall be cut off אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יְקַנֵּ֣א <WH7065> shall not envy אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and Judah לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָצֹ֥ר <WH6887> and the adversaries אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> Ephraim

וְעָפ֨וּ <WH5774> But they shall fly בְכָתֵ֤ף <WH3802> upon the shoulders פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> toward the west יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together יָבֹ֣זּוּ <WH962> they shall spoil אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> them קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> of the east אֱד֤וֹם <WH123> upon Edom וּמוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> and Moab מִשְׁל֣וֹח <WH4916> they shall lay יָדָ֔ם <WH3027> their hand וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon מִשְׁמַעְתָּֽם׃ <WH8085> listen

וְהֶחֱרִ֣ים <WH2763> shall utterly destroy יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵ֚ת <WH853> לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> the tongue יָם־ <WH3220> sea מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptian וְהֵנִ֥יף <WH5130> shall he shake יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> over הַנָּהָ֖ר <WH5104> over the river בַּעְיָ֣ם <WH5868> and with his mighty רוּח֑וֹ <WH7307> wind וְהִכָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH5221> and shall smite לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> it in the seven נְחָלִ֔ים <WH5158> streams וְהִדְרִ֖יךְ <WH1869> and make [men] go over בַּנְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH5275> dryshod

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> will be a מְסִלָּ֔ה <WH4546> And there shall be an highway לִשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> for the remnant עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> of his people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִשָּׁאֵ֖ר <WH7604> shall be left מֵֽאַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> from Assyria כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> become לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> like as it was to Israel בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day עֲלֹת֖וֹ <WH5927> that he came up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt
